apiKey.label: Hyperspell API Key
apiKey.help: Your API key from app.hyperspell.com (or use ${HYPERSPELL_API_KEY})

userId.label: User ID
userId.help: Optional user ID to scope searches. Required for non-JWT API keys.

autoContext.label: Auto-Context
autoContext.help: Inject relevant memories before every AI turn

sources.label: Sources
sources.help: Comma-separated list of sources to search. Leave empty for all sources.

maxResults.label: Max Results
maxResults.help: Maximum memories injected into context per turn

debug.label: Debug Logging
debug.help: Enable verbose debug logs for API calls and responses
